Commands.Blizzara ROK: Potent Ice BRV group magic attack.High turn rate
Commands.Triple Slip: Self: 0.8x INT BRV to BRVSelf: 4 turns Charge & DodgeBoosts BRV attack while Charge & Dodge buff is active

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Mighty Blizzard ROK: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Blizzard ROK by 10%.
Artifacts.Bravery Triple Slip: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Triple Slip.

Passives.Blizzard ROK Charge: Increases the max uses of Blizzard ROK by 1.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Blizzard ROK Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Blizzard ROK.
Passives.Triple Slip BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Triple Slip.
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after inflicting a critical hit.
Passives.Triple Slip Charge: Increases the max uses of Triple Slip by 1.
Passives.Triple Slip Dodge Up: Slightly raises evasion rate while Charge & Dodge is up.
Passives.Symbol of Bravery: Counters avoided enemy attacks with a BRV attack.
Passives.Triple Slip Boost: Largely raises MAX BRV while Charge & Dodge active
Passives.Blizzard ROK Extension: Blizzard ROK use +2When using Blizzard ROK, Blizzara ROK: Slight BRV damage boostUpon using Blizzara ROK: Triggers additional single-target HP attack
Passives.Focused Attack: BRV damage  1.6 when attacking single target with group attack
Passives.Triple Slip Extension: Triple Slip use +1When using Triple Slip: Largely increased BRV gained based on INT BRV Marginal turn rate boost with Charge & Dodge Slight dodge rate boost with Charge & DodgeWhen using Charged Shot: Large damage boost Slightly higher turn rate

Weapons.Rune Trigger CP: 35: Raises Triple Slip's BRV gain.Improves the effects of Charge & Dodge and extends its duration.Grants Small Attack Up for 8 turns.
Weapons.Magicite Pistol CP: 15: Increases the potency of Blizzard ROK and Blizzara ROK.
